DOC.brief_summary: Despite fact pancreatoduodenectomy standard treatment malignant tumor periampullary area , morbidity mortality rate intra-abdominal collection , post pancreatectomy hemorrhage , delay gastric emptying , still high approximately 50-60 % . The cause complication usually come post-operative pancreatic fistula . Nowadays , several method report reduce incidence pancreatic fistula undergo pancreatoduodenectomy , pancreatic stenting , use intravenous somatostatin , use sealant material wrap anastomosis soft tissue . Wrapping pancreato-jejunal anastomosis omentum complicate procedure require extra treatment expense patient . It report technique applied non-randomized control trial data significantly show technique could reduce pancreatic fistula rate . Therefore , researcher want conduct RCT study compare complication rate omental roll-up pancreato-jejunal anastomosis non-omental roll-up group .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Omental Roll-up Technique Pancreato-jejunostomy Anastomosis Reducing Perioperative Complication Patients Undergoing Pancreatoduodenectomy
DOC.detailed_description: This RCT study design compare use omental roll-up technique non-omental roll-up technique pancreato-jejunal anastomosis patient undergo pancreatoduodenectomy . The purpose study prove hypothesis omental roll-up technique reduce complication rate pancratic fistula pancreatoduodenectomy . This study approve committee human right conduct research involve human subject , faculty medicine Ramathibodi hospital , Mahidol university . The patient operate experienced surgeon Hepato-pancreato-biliary unit , department surgery , Ramathibodi hospital randomize two group use close envelope method complete pancreato-jejunal anastomosis . Then , patient followed-up data collect 30 day surgery .
